children.subject: Note: this would over the summer with a possibility of starting earlier.

history.content:
We have some open positions for a project applying Machine Learning/Data Science  to Parkinson's Disease. This is a collaboration between ICSI and the UCSF Center for Imaging of Neurodegenerative Diseases. It will apply Machine Learning to understand the progression of Parkinson's disease and evaluate MRI images.  Basic knowledge of Machine Learning/Data Science is required.  Knowledge of CNN's is a plus.  Academic credit is possible.  
Please email your Resume and Transcript to ejf27@berkeley.edu if you are interested. http://www1.icsi.berkeley.edu/~ejf/
history.subject: Research Positions in ML applied to a Parkinson's disease.
